item.title: Achieving AWS SA - Associate (SAA-C03) Certification
item.description: View my badge! Certified: 11th Aug 2023. ![[Digital-Cottage/Notes/attachments/Achieving AWS SA - Associate (SAA-C03) Certification.png]] Thoughts on Content: Generally, all cloud service offerings are based on existing technologies that customers would host themselves and that many are already familiar with.

item.title: Personally Defined Rules For Learning With AI
item.description: Fundamentally, AI should be used as a first-point substitution for scanning of documentation, rubber ducky-ing as well as a tool to reduce start-up friction to tasks â€” but rarely as a tool for bridging gaps in logic ability.
